name: Paragliding Sim
description:
The most realistic paragliding sim ever made!

Controller and mouse support coming soon.

Fly cross coutry, ridge soar or speed fly the terrain with any glider of your choice. This simulator includes dynamic wind (ridge lift, lee side sink) as well as thermals which are most likely found on the sunny faces of the terrain. 

Enjoy and if you would like to see further developments please consider donating.

Thanks
